constraint.name: ca_transferenciasstock_almacenes_ori
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codalmacenorigen) REFERENCES almacenes (codalmacen) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_transferenciasstock_almacenes_des
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codalmacendestino) REFERENCES almacenes (codalmacen) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_transferenciasstock_users
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
